Specimen Container(s): Exchangeable handle with NO scrubber filter
Methodologies: Quantitative measurement of exhaled nitric oxide
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for NIOX VERO system using electrochemical detection to measure nitric oxide in expired breath for evaluation of airway inflammation.
Indications for Use Summary: Provides non-invasive quantitative measurement of fractional exhaled nitric oxide in expired breath as an adjunct to established clinical and laboratory assessments of asthma patients, for evaluating response to anti-inflammatory therapy in children (7-17 years) and adults (18+ years).
